data.text:
Britney Theriot, an acclaimed American actress, has maintained her personal life in secrecy, prompting individuals to seek further information on Wikipedia.

Britney Theriot is an American actress and real estate agent, who making an impressive performance in her acting career.

Further, she came into the limelight after working in a few movies and television series in the film industry.

Likewise, her role was highly appreciated by the audience and directors.

Lately, she has been in the spotlight due to her relationship with acclaimed actor Russell Crowe.

Due to her romantic involvement with Crowe, netizens are actively searching for the Wikipedia of Britney Theriot.

Britney Theriot Wikipedia, Age, And Net Worth

Despite her well-known personality, a dedicated Wikipedia of Britney Theriot has not been made yet.

Though Wikipedia has yet to dedicate a page to Britney Theriot, she has built her career in both Hollywood and real estate.

Britney Theriot was born on June 19, 1991, in New Orleans, Louisiana, making her 31 years old as of 2022.

She attended St. Maryâs Dominican High School, a private Catholic girlâs school in New Orleans.

Theriot went on to earn a Bachelor of Science degree in Electrical Engineering from Louisiana State University.

After completing her education, Theriot began modeling and eventually transitioned into acting.

She made her acting debut in the 2013 Broken City thriller starring Mark Wahlberg and Russell Crowe.

Furthermore, she had a minor role in the film Valerie and appeared in the 2022 war drama The Greatest Beer Run Ever.

In addition to acting, Theriot has worked as a real estate agent for Mirambell Realty in New Orleans since 2017.

She maintains a private Instagram account but her Facebook profile is public.

As per the report, Britney Theriotâs net worth is estimated to be around $150,000.

Most of her wealth comes from her real estate career and minor acting roles.

Moreover, she lives a relatively low-key lifestyle outside of her relationship with Russell Crowe.

This has led people to wonder about the relationship of Britney Theriot, eventually leading the search for her Wikipedia.

Britney Theriot And Her Boyfriend Russell Crowe Relationship

Britney Theriot and Russell Crowe first met on the set of Broken City in 2013 but did not become romantically involved until seven years later.

The couple went public with their relationship in November 2020 when they were spotted showing PDA in Sydney, Australia.

At 58 years old, Russell Crowe is nearly 30 years older than 31-year-old Britney Theriot.

Crowe was previously married to Danielle Spencer from 2003 to 2018 and they have two sons together.

Since going public, Crowe and Theriot have been spotted together on several occasions looking cozy and romantic.

However, they have avoided making too many official public appearances together.

In October 2022, the couple finally made their red carpet debut as a pair at the Rome premiere of Croweâs film Poker Face.

Although the pair have not publicly commented on their relationship, there were rumors that Crowe and Theriot secretly wed in Italy in mid-2022.

Reports claimed it was an intimate ceremony attended by only close friends and family.

However, the actors never addressed or confirmed this marriage speculation.

At present, it appears Russell Crowe and Britney Theriot are content being in a private, long-term relationship.
